verses.text_plain: In the year that Tartan came unto Ashdod, (when Sargon the king of Assyria sent him,) and fought against Ashdod, and took it;
verses.verse_html: 1In the year that Tartan came unto Ashdod, (when Sargon the king of Assyria sent him,) and fought against Ashdod, and took it;

verses.text_plain: At the same time spake the Lord by Isaiah the son of Amoz, saying, Go and loose the sackcloth from off thy loins, and put off thy shoe from thy foot. And he did so, walking naked and barefoot.
verses.verse_html:
2At the same time spake the Lord by Isaiah the son of Amoz, saying, Go and loose the sackcloth from off thy loins, and put off thy shoe from thy foot. And he did so, walking naked and barefoot. ▼
▼ by: Heb. by the hand of

tokens.definition: יְשַׁעְיָה Yᵉshaʻyâh, yesh-ah-yaw'; or יְשַׁעְיָהוּ Yᵉshaʻyâhûw; from H3467 and H3050 ; Jah has saved; Jeshajah, the name of seven Israelites:—Isaiah, Jesaiah, Jeshaiah.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: Isaiah (32x), Jeshaiah (5x), Jesaiah (2x).
outline: Isaiah or Jesaiah or Jeshaiah = "Jehovah has saved" the major prophet, son of Amoz, who prophesied concerning Judah and Jerusalem during the days of kings Uzziah, Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah of Judah; author of the prophetic book by his name; tradition has it that he was sawn asunder in the trunk of a carob tree by king Manasseh and that this is the incident referred to in Heb 11:: 37 son of Hananiah, brother of Pelatiah, and grandson of Zerubbabel a Benjamite one of the 6 sons of Jeduthun son of Rehabiah, a descendant of Moses through Gershom, and an ancestor of a Levite treasurer in the time of David son of Athaliah and chief of the house of Elam who returned with Ezra a chief of the descendants of Merari who returned with Ezra

tokens.definition: אָמַר ʼâmar, aw-mar'; a primitive root; to say (used with great latitude):—answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, × desire, determine, × expressly, × indeed, × intend, name, × plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), × still, × suppose, talk, tell, term, × that is, × think, use (speech), utter, × verily, × yet.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: said (4,: 874x), speak (179x), answer (99x), command (30x), tell (29x), call (7x), promised (6x), miscellaneous (84x).
outline: to say, speak, utter (Qal) to say, to answer, to say in one's heart, to think, to command, to promise, to intend (Niphal) to be told, to be said, to be called (Hithpael) to boast, to act proudly (Hiphil) to avow, to avouch
(Qal) to say, to answer, to say in one's heart, to think, to command, to promise, to intend
(Niphal) to be told, to be said, to be called

tokens.definition: יוֹם yôwm, yome; from an unused root meaning to be hot; a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb):—age, always, chronicals, continually(-ance), daily, ((birth-), each, to) day, (now a, two) days (agone), elder, × end, evening, (for) ever(-lasting, -more), × full, life, as (so) long as (... live), (even) now, old, outlived, perpetually, presently, remaineth, × required, season, × since, space, then, (process of) time, as at other times, in trouble, weather, (as) when, (a, the, within a) while (that), × whole ( age), (full) year(-ly), younger.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: day (2,: 008x), time (64x), chronicles (with H 1697) (37x), daily (44x), ever (18x), year (14x), continually (10x), when (10x), as (10x), while (8x), full (8x), always (4x), whole (4x), alway (4x), miscellaneous (44x).
outline: as a division of time a working day, a day's journey
a working day, a day's journey

tokens.definition: כֹּה kôh, ko; from the prefix k and H1931 ; properly, like this, i.e. by implication, (of manner) thus (or so); also (of place) here (or hither); or (of time) now:—also, here, hitherto, like, on the other side, so (and much), such, on that manner, (on) this (manner, side, way, way and that way), mean while, yonder.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: thus , so...also , like , hitherto , while , on this manner .
outline: thus, here, in this manner thus, so here, here and there until now, until now...until then, meanwhile
until now, until now...until then, meanwhile

tokens.definition: מַבָּט mabbâṭ, mab-bawt'; or מֶבָּט mebbâṭ; from H5027 ; something expected, i.e. (abstractly) expectation:—expectation.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: expectation (3x).
outline: expectation, object of hope or confidence

tokens.definition: נוּס nûwç, noos; a primitive root; to flit, i.e. vanish away (subside, escape; causatively, chase, impel, deliver):— × abate, away, be displayed, (make to) flee (away, -ing), put to flight, × hide, lift up a standard.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: flee (142x), flee away (12x), abated (1x), displayed (1x), flight (1x), hide (1x), flee out (1x), lift up a standard (1x), variant (1x).
outline: to flee, escape (Qal) to flee to escape to take flight,: m depart, disappear to fly (to the attack) on horseback (Polel) to drive at (Hithpolel) to take flight (Hiphil) to put to flight to drive hastily to cause to disappear, hide
(Qal) to flee to escape to take flight,: m depart, disappear to fly (to the attack) on horseback
to take flight,: m depart, disappear
to fly (to the attack) on horseback

tokens.definition: עֶזְרָה ʻezrâh, ez-raw'; or עֶזְרָת ʻezrâth; (Psalm 60:11 (13); Psalm 108:12 (13)), feminine of H5828 ; aid:—help(-ed, -er).
tokens.kjv_translation_count: help (25x), helpers (1x).
outline: help, succour, assistance help, succour one who helps

tokens.definition: נָצַל nâtsal, naw-tsal'; a primitive root; to snatch away, whether in a good or a bad sense:— × at all, defend, deliver (self), escape, × without fail, part, pluck, preserve, recover, rescue, rid, save, spoil, strip, × surely, take (out).
tokens.kjv_translation_count: deliver (179x), recover (5x), rid (3x), escape (2x), rescue (2x), spoil (2x), at all (2x), take out (2x), miscellaneous (16x).

tokens.definition: פָּנִים pânîym, paw-neem'; plural (but always as singular) of an unused noun פָּנֶה pâneh; from H6437 ); the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.):— accept, a-(be-) fore(-time), against, anger, × as (long as), at, battle, because (of), beseech, countenance, edge, employ, endure, enquire, face, favour, fear of, for, forefront(-part), form(-er time, -ward), from, front, heaviness, × him(-self), honourable, impudent, in, it, look(-eth) (-s), × me, meet, × more than, mouth, of, off, (of) old (time), × on, open, out of, over against, the partial, person, please, presence, prospect, was purposed, by reason of, regard, right forth, serve, × shewbread, sight, state, straight, street, × thee, × them(-selves), through ( -out), till, time(-s) past, (un-) to(-ward), upon, upside ( down), with(-in, -stand), × ye, × you.

tokens.definition: מֶלֶךְ melek, meh'-lek; from H4427 ; a king:—king, royal.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: king (2,: 518x), royal (2x), Hammelech (1x), Malcham (1x), Moloch (1x).

tokens.pos: proper locative noun, proper masculine noun
tokens.definition: אַשּׁוּר ʼAshshûwr, ash-shoor'; or אַשֻּׁר ʼAshshur; apparently from H833 (in the sense of successful); Ashshur, the second son of Shem; also his descendants and the country occupied by them (i.e. Assyria), its region and its empire:—Asshur, Assur, Assyria, Assyrians. See H838 .
tokens.kjv_translation_count: Assyria (118x), Assyrian (19x), Asshur (8x), Assyrian (with H 1121) (5x), Assur (1x).
outline: Asshur or Assyria = "a step" proper masculine noun the second son of Shem, eponymous ancestor of the Assyrians the people of Assyria proper locative noun the nation, Assyria the land, Assyria or Asshur
the second son of Shem, eponymous ancestor of the Assyrians
the people of Assyria proper locative noun

tokens.definition: מָלַט mâlaṭ, maw-lat'; a primitive root; properly, to be smooth, i.e. (by implication) to escape (as if by slipperiness); causatively, to release or rescue; specifically, to bring forth young, emit sparks:—deliver (self), escape, lay, leap out, let alone, let go, preserve, save, × speedily, × surely.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: escape (47x), deliver (33x), save (5x), ...out (4x), alone (1x), get away (1x), lay (1x), preserve (1x), speedily (1x), surely (1x).
